article.title: Playing with MSK kafka
article.author: Sergey Pogorelov
article.excerpt: When you work with MSK you might want to connect with local producer/consumer to it for the test purposes, but you should keep in mind that MSK (as all AWS services) requires connection through SSL and here you'll need to specify it in your Kafka client...

authors.bio: A handyman from the web-development world. Lifelong learning software developer. Passionate about Web technologies (specializes in Spring and Big Data)
authors.name: Sergey Pogorelov
